soft: You are a breath of fresh air.
Your kindness is a gift to everyone you meet.
You have such a peaceful energy.
It's okay to take it slow today.
You are enough, exactly as you are.
cheerful: Something wonderful is going to happen to you today!
You make the world sparkle a little brighter!
extra_wholesome: The world is so much better with you in it.
I'm so incredibly proud of you.
You are loved more than you know.
Your heart is made of pure gold.
You deserve all the cozy blankets and warm tea in the world.
